title: Integrate Wisp/Sprites Go Stack
overview: Integrate with Wisp (Sprite session manager), WebTmux, and the Sprites Firecracker platform. This allows Wreckit to orchestrate isolated microVM environments, spawning agents inside them for secure, sandboxed execution.
problem_statement: Wreckit currently runs locally. For dangerous or complex tasks, we need isolated, disposable environments. The Go stack (Wisp/Sprites) provides this capability.
motivation: To enable 'Sandbox Mode' where agents run in Firecracker VMs, accessible via WebTmux, managed via Wisp CLI.
success_criteria: New `wreckit sprite` CLI command group (start, attach, list, kill)
RLM tools (`spawn_sprite`, etc.) exposed to agents
Integration tests mocking the Wisp CLI
technical_constraints: Must shell out to `wisp` binary (do not rewrite logic)
Must integrate with existing RLM and Config systems
scope_out_of_scope: Installing Wisp/Go binaries (assumed present or handled by user)
